title: Ready to Wok - script
content:
Hello

Please tell me if this is a font (excluding the Japanese letter). Two “o”s look similar.

Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203162210im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Wok_6622.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Prairie Federal serif face - Utopia {Mikey D}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203162210/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39084 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Nau Mai script logo – Affair {Marten F} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203162210/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39083 "Go to next forum topic")
author: misalion

comments.content: I don’t know an exact match – but searching for [faux chinese](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203162210/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20faux%20chinese) will bring up a lot of alternatives.

Looks familiar, but the closest I can find is Smudger.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203162210im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Smudger_6089.gif)
